title: AE脚本-根据电子表格生成合成图层 CompsFromSpreadsheet 5.1.5 + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: 该AE脚本可通过电子表格快速生成After Effects合成，还能替换合成中的文字内容等。支持Win/Mac系统，适用于Adobe After Effects CC 2019, CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014 。
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CC 2019, CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014

other.script_english_introduction: CompsFromSpreadsheet allows you to quickly generate copies of your After Effects compositions, updating the new comps with data from a spreadsheet used to insert text and replace layers.
other.script_installation: 将jsxbin脚本文件拷贝到以下目录：…..\Adobe After Effects 版本号\Support Files\Scripts\ScriptUI Panels\
